title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, the changes take effect immediately.
OB: After removing a working set, the package view is not filtered as expected.
EB: After removing a working set, the package view should remain filtered as before.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set. The package view should still be filtered.
